title: Spec101 Metal Floating Shelf - Decorative Heart Design Hanging Shelf Wall Decor for Food, Collectibles, or Decoration
features: [Decorate Your Space]: Add flair to any room with the Spec101 Black Metal Wall Shelf; Heart-Shaped novelty wall shelving accents your space with a modern charm

[Quality You Can Trust]: Constructed from wrought iron with black finish to match your existing decor; Designed with wooden floating shelving to accentuate your decorations; Iron wire backing keeps your collectibles from falling off
[Liven Up Your Events]: Prop up the metal decorative shelf at an event and hold desserts, pictures, or small centerpiece decorations; Perfect for weddings, anniversary parties, or baby showers

[Accent Any Room]: Install the heart wood wall shelf in the kitchen to hold spices, cooking timer, shot glasses, or small teaspoons; Place knickknacks or small decorations on the 10 x 3-inch (25 x 8cm) wooden shelf; Hang next to your bookshelf to showcase collectibles

[Package Details]: Package comes with one black heart-shaped metal floating wall shelf measuring 10 x 12 x 3 inches (25 x 30 x 8cm); 2 small 0.8-inch (2cm) holes are located on the round parts of the heart to hang; 2 screws and 2 plastic screws are included
description: Organize your collectibles with the farmhouse style Spec101 Small Floating Wall Shelf. Modern heart-shaped wall hanging shelf organizes and accents any room in your home. Hang the bathroom wall shelf above your toilet to hold small rags, jewelry, or perfume. Add candles, rocks, or plants to brighten up your living room or bedroom. Wrought iron floating rustic shelf can hold food items and be the centerpiece at any event. Metal wire backing prevents food or decorations from falling off. Wooden black floating shelving measures 10 x 3in. Package includes a single black metal wood wall shelf measuring 10 x 12 x 3in and includes hardware for easy installation. Decorate your home or impress guests at your next event with the Spec101 novelty heart-shaped floating metal wall shelf. Warning: This product can expose you to chemicals which is [are] known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm.
